channel.title: Some coding questions
channel.description:
Ok, I was just wondering... I have been much away now, and now I have to ask some questions, and i hope anyone can answer. I know I'm such a noob after the big break. :P
1. How is it possible to make just a public int use fist fighting. All i need is the code for fist fighting. Then I fix it by meself.
2. Possible to use a public int at xp rate? (making 1 person get 4x xp rate and another one get 1x xp rate by the same weapon/fist fighting)
3. Possible to make talking interface with 4 options you can CLICK 100%?
Thats it...
Sincerly, Marius
PS: I think I was a better coder before I took this big break. :P[br][size=1]Posted on: 27-03-2007, 17:55:31[/size][hr][quote="mariuswb"]Ok, I was just wondering... I have been much away now, and now I have to ask some questions, and i hope anyone can answer. I know I'm such a noob after the big break. :P
1. How is it possible to make just a public int use fist fighting. All i need is the code for fist fighting. Then I fix it by meself.
2. Possible to use a public int at xp rate? (making 1 person get 4x xp rate and another one get 1x xp rate by the same weapon/fist fighting)
3. Possible to make talking interface with 4 options you can CLICK 100%?
Thats it...
Sincerly, Marius
PS: I think I was a better coder before I took this big break. :P[/quote] no-one?
